sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import NavBar from '../components/Navbar/NavBar'; import Footer from '../components/Footer'; import axios from 'axios'; import toast from 'react-hot-toast'; const Contact = () => { const [firstName, setFirstName] = useState(""); const [lastName, setLastName] = useState(""); const [email, setEmail] = useState(""); const [phone, setPhone] = useState(""); const [message, setMessage] = useState(""); const handleMessage = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); try { await axios .post( "https://tsp-line.onrender.com/api/v1/message/send", { firstName, lastName, email, phone, message }, { withCredentials: true, headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json" }, } ) .then((res) => { toast.success(res.data.message); setFirstName(""); setLastName(""); setEmail(""); setPhone(""); setMessage(""); }); } catch (error) { toast.error(error.response.data.message); } }; return ( <>

Send us a message

setFirstName(e.target.value)} />
setLastName(e.target.value)} />
setEmail(e.target.value)} />
setPhone(e.target.value)} />

----- OR -----

Chat with us on WhatsApp

Office Address

Alephata, Tal-Junnar, Dist-Pune

Call Us

Tel: 8421893853

Send an E-mail

varadwagh326@gmail.com

) } export default Contact;
